home.today:
I think a lot.
So I write things down—often.
Some might call it a journal, a memo, or a log.

byuls (/bjʌls/, '별' <audio></audio>) is a small tool I built to capture those thoughts lightly and display them naturally anywhere on a website.

Like stars scattered across the night sky, I wanted to gather my thoughts in one place—so that I can always return to them.
